video.title: Long Way Down
video.synopsis: Actor friends Ewan McGregor and Charley Boorman ride again, this time on an epic motorcycle journey from Scotland to South Africa.

episodes.synopsis: Ewan McGregor and Charley Boorman prepare to hit the road on their motorcycles in an epic 24,000-kilometer journey from Scotland to Africa.
episodes.title: Gentlemen, Start Your Engines

episodes.synopsis: After a miserable ride to London, Ewan and Charley push on to France. Despite arduous weather conditions, they must stay on a strict time course.
episodes.title: Scotland to Italy

episodes.synopsis: Ewan and Charley battle traffic in Rome. Tensions are high on the ferry ride from Sicily to Tunisia over Charley's dangerous bike stunts.
episodes.title: Rome to Tobruk

episodes.synopsis: Riding through Egypt, the boys doubt whether they will make it to Aswan in time for the ferry. If they miss it, they will be delayed for a week.
episodes.title: Tobruk to Khartoum

episodes.synopsis: Charley and Ewan are starting to embrace Africa. Tiredness creeps in as the long riding days become more strenuous.
episodes.title: Sudan to Ethiopia

episodes.synopsis: In Kenya, the soft sand makes it difficult to keep the bikes upright. But when the terrain finally changes, it causes more problems.
episodes.title: Into Kenya

episodes.synopsis: Ewan gets very excited when he sees wild zebras for the first time. Later, the guys trek to the mountains to see gorillas in their natural habitat.
episodes.title: Kenya to Rwanda

episodes.synopsis: Ewan and Charley visit the home of Paul Kagame, the president of Rwanda. Later, Ewan and his wife are reunited after two months apart.
episodes.title: Kigali to Malawi

episodes.synopsis: In Malawi, Ewan and Charley see firsthand how UNICEF is helping children in the area. Later, Charley decides to do a 111-meter bungee jump.
episodes.title: Malawi to Botswana

episodes.synopsis: As Ewan and Charley's exciting adventure comes to an end, the team is overjoyed when they reach their final destination, Cape Town.
episodes.title: Botswana to Cape Town
